means: 操贡多拉（意大利威尼斯的狭长小船）的船夫

sentence.Network_en: The president of the United States a gondolier in Venice, just fill in the names.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国总统,威尼斯船夫, 只要填写他们的名字.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(G) -亿城英语 ... gondola 狭长小船 gondolier 船夫 gone 离去的.
...想体验悠闲的怀旧气氛，非得乘坐威尼斯代表交通工具「贡多拉(Gondolier)」；贡多拉船只整身漆著古朴的黑漆，船底平铺，两头尖 …
而贡多拉船夫(Gondolier)则是威尼斯象徵与神话的一部分，传说这些船夫天生就有蹼脚，能行走于水面上。这传说虽嫌夸大，但他们 …
以 -er 结尾的英语单词... ... flier 飞行者, 快车, 快船, gondolier (威尼斯)平底船船夫, 操 earlier (比较)早的, 初期的, 早地.

list.abs: a boating song sung by Venetian gondoliers ., 由威尼斯的船夫演唱的船歌.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: via French from Italian gondoliere, from gondola (see gondola)

means.word_mean: 1. a (Venetian) boatman who propels a gondola

auth_sentence.content: He even favors flat-topped boater hats, which cause him to bear more than a passing resemblance to a gondolier.
auth_sentence.res_content: He even favors flat-topped boater hats, which cause him to bear more than a passing resemblance to a gondolier.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He even favors flat-topped boater hats, which cause him to bear more than a passing resemblance to a gondolier.
